messages.title: Who will really fight for Kingston & Surbiton?
messages.content: Everybody knows that local resident Ed Davey will always fight for local people

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Investment in NHS and local schools
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Ed has a record of securing investment in the NHS and local schools, and is still fighting for school buildings and improved public services.
The Lib Dems have delivered a £800 tax cut for working people and are pushing for a further £400 cut.

mentions.tacticalSituation: It's Lib Dem or the Tories here today: Labour are well behind in third and can't win here—every vote for them just helps the Tories win here.

leaflet.personalStatement: Ed Davey - Our local Lib Dem champion

images.caption: Vote comparison chart showing Lib Dem at 50%, Con at 37%, and Lab at 9%.

leaflet.additionalNotes: The Tory candidate is described as having been 'parachuted in from Westminster' and the leaflet accuses the Tories of plotting £50 billion of extra cuts to vital services.
